name: Savoy Homann
detail: I made a booking for a childhood friend of mine whom recently got married and was in Bandung for their first together trip with his wife and their first Honeymoon! I booked the rooms for them for the Deluxe Room King Bed which includes breakfast. After some research and reading up the good reviews of this place. This iconic curved-shaped building, Savoy Homann Bidakara Hotel offers elegant rooms in Bandung’s city centre. The service of this hotel is above excellent. The rooms are very clean. Staying in Savoy Homann Bidakara Hotel and you will learn its full history here. Authentic rooms with interior designs just done too perfectly. The location is simply strategic, in front of Museum KAA, nearby to Braga street and near Masjid Agung Bandung. Distance to the airport is not too far away. This hotel met my friend’s expectation. Featuring free Wifi connections around the hotel vicinity was way too good for them. This is my friend’s review and feedback after they got back to Singapore. They loved this hotel and definitely would be a great memory for them here especially for his wife. She was just too amazed with the lovely great decorations done in the room for them! Really appreciate the kind staffs over the past day there. Nice place, warm service, great panorama, delicious food, good daily activities, strong wifi access and with the right person to call off this fantastic perfect honeymoon. The feeling there was like Oh My God!!! Fabulous!!! Fantastic!!! Everything is like heaven here, Said his wife. There are no words that can describe the place, simply beautiful, cozy and memorable experience here. They will definitely come back here when they visit Bandung again. They would like to once again wish the hotel staffs a Big Thank You. Simply amazing, warm and friendly! =)
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Aryaduta Bandung
detail: I stayed in this hotel during my business trip in Bandung and had a 2 days meeting which has to be relocated in the last minutes. Surprisingly the hotel staff offered me the meeting room. They arranged everything perfectly, professionally and made my meetings went smoothly. Many thanks for all the staff who made this possible. Another thing I noticed is they are striving to make their client satisfied and this is something that I never found in other 5 stars hotels in Bandung. Definitely will stay in this hotel again, as always =)

name: Hilton Bandung
detail: Local travelers who rarely frequent Bandung, especially those from Jakarta, would be pleasantly surprised when they stay at Hilton Bandung. Set with lower expectations of how nice 5-star hotels in Bandung would fare compared to the ones in Jakarta, these travelers would be quite awed with Hilton Bandung's modern and sophisticated design that is done flawlessly without forgoing comfort. So if you're looking for a modernly aesthetic, comfortable hotel in Bandung, Hilton Bandung can be your best bet.

name: THE 1O1 Bandung Dago Hotel
detail: This is one hotel in Bandung that I will return to. We got a free upgrade thanks to the staff u knew that we are on a honeymoon. They were very helpful, especially Ricky (supervisor). He helped us arrange our transport and even sit and hang with us a little to introduce the hotel and himself. Other front desk staff we helpful as well, they recommended places where locals shop and dine. The rooms are awesome and spacious enough for us and the location of the hotel is just right for travelers who wish to shop in th city.

name: Kalya Hotel Bandung Dago
detail: I will definitely stay in this hotel again if I come to Bandung. It is clean, the Recept, Security guards are polite and super helpful Only thing is that my room (Rm 308) cannot be locked from the inside, but since the door is using auto magnetic door, so I guess this should not posed a serious trouble.

name: The Papandayan Hotel
detail: It was really really good. As mentioned, hospitality was unmatched by any other hotel I've ever stayed in. The hotel staff went to the best of their ability to tend to our needs. We managed to have the relaxing holiday we wanted. Transport infrastructure within bandung is a huge challenge. Angkots are mostly for the locals as they are familiar with the routes, no trains or teams around, and few taxis available. We had to hire a car for the day or book a taxi, of which it took at least 20 min wait each time. However the staff made it much easier for us by helping us with these difficulties. The concierge, Agust, even ran after us as we walked towards out taxi to the airport and presented us an elephant soft toy each, thanking us for our stay and welcoming us to stay with them again. It was simply fantastic. We had a great time. Thank you Papandayan hotel!
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Aston Pasteur
detail: This is one of the best hotels in Bandung very close to most shopping malls like Paris Van Java and Pascal Mall. Very clean and tidy hotel and room was very neat and clean with super comfortable bed and pillows. This hotel deserve to be a 5 star hotel. Every staff was very welcoming and helpful in booking a taxi and explaining the places around. I would stay in this hotel again for sure.

name: ARTOTEL Suites Aquila - Bandung
detail: it's nice time to spend it in this hotel with my family bu i have two points: 5 star hotel without gym??? this is not 5 star hotel. every order under room you need to pay it cash?? this is not acceptable!!! they need to solve above two issues to be one of the best hotel in bandung.

name: Kimaya Braga Bandung by Harris
detail: The location is excellent, just a 3-min walk to Jalan Braga.
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: The Luxton Hotel
detail: I had a wonderful stay at The Luxton. The breakfast was excellent. The room is very clean n comfortable. My kids enjoyed swimming eventhough it rained evryday bec of the indoor swimming pool. My kids love the kids club. The only thing that need improvement is the parking area which is too small. But tht's not a big problem coz thy provide free vallet parking which is very helpful. This will be one of my favourite hotel in Bandung.
